name: Sweet Potato And Apple Puree
keywords: appetizer, side dish, apple, ginger, sweet potato, fall, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds sweet potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced
1 1/2 pounds apples, peeled, quartered and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the potatoes with water; cover the pot, and boil the potatoes until they are tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
Put the apples, ginger and 3 tablespoons of the orange juice in a skillet, and saute until the apples are tender.
In a food processor or food mill, puree the apples with the potatoes, adding the remaining orange juice, the lemon juice and the cinnamon.
